<div class="world-cup-podcast__wrapper"><style>#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher,#football-weekly.fc-container--thrasher,#football-weekly.fc-container--thrasher #right-arrow,#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__play svg path{fill:#121212}.football-weekly__wrapper{width:100%;position:relative;overflow:hidden;font-family:"Guardian Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif}.world-cup-podcast__wrapper{width:100%}@media all and (min-width:61.25em){.world-cup-podcast__wrapper{padding-top:6px}}section#world-cup-daily.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner,section#world-cup-daily.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner .fc-container__body .fc-slice-wrapper ul{overflow:visible}section#world-cup-daily.fc-container--thrasher .fc-container__inner .fc-container__body .fc-slice-wrapper .facia-snap{overflow:visible;background-color:#00b2ff}section#world-cup-daily a.fc-trail__count.fc-trail__count--commentcount{display:none!important}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher{width:auto;position:relative;padding:12px;min-height:130px;overflow:hidden}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .logo{position:absolute;top:0}@media all and (max-width:71.24em){#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .logo{display:none}}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher 160ms,transform 160ms}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__play{cursor:pointer;left:59.5%;z-index:310;opacity:1;transform:scale(1,1);transition:opacity 240ms,transform 240ms}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher .player .player__play:hover{opacity:.95}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher[data-playing] .player .player__play{transform:scale(.92,.92);opacity:0}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher[data-playing] .player .player__playing{transform:scale(1,1);opacity:1}#football-daily-euro-2016-podcast-thrasher
